website_summaries.verdict: Special features make it perfect for international travel.
pros: Worldwide SIM-free connection means you can travel freely without worrying about using a local SIM card or racking up roaming charges
Comes with 1GB initial global data and offers different data plans based on the country you are in
Connects up to five devices at a time
With a 15-hour use time on a charge, it will last throughout your travels
cons: Power button is easy to accidentally turn on

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you can return unit
customer_reviews.text: I spoke with a representative of GlocalMe prior to purchasing their product. Since my purchase i have made no less than 10 calls to them and they have NOT returned any call. The unit did not work in Italy, far from a remote country. So, i had no service for 1 month. There were no purchase options that worked.
customer_reviews.author: Jummers

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, so glad I got this!
customer_reviews.text: This little hotspot is awesome! It was super easy to set up. I had one issue with registration, and the chat option on the app was great. They answered me within minutes. It is fast, and keeps a charge for a good part of the day. It really works great in Cancun Mexico, I used a separate Telcel data SIM card, and it has kept me connected the whole time. I love the slim design of this. I would highly recommend this Glocalme G4 hotspot!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Anastos

customer_reviews.title: Product ok, Customer Service Awful
customer_reviews.text: The actual device is easy to use but customer service is very, very poor and rude!! Made me really regret buying this device based on my interactions with customer service alone.
customer_reviews.author: Pandabro

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a phone, but cant try it yet....
customer_reviews.text: So, just got this today. Anyone who is wondering if it works in Iraq? It doesn't. The user manual is a quick start manual without much information. Have to download the APP and pair your phone with it. I contacted customer service via chat and he was helpful. However, I see this has a "receiver" (spot for your ear like a phone) and microphone. Why it has this? I have no clue. This was one thing he was not helpful with. I thought this was just a wireless hotspot. Makes no sense. I won't be able to use this until I travel next month, so will update my experience then.
customer_reviews.author: Gunny D

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Ughhh, I bought this for a trip and it never would work the entire time I was overseas. I will be inquiring about exchanging or returning as I will need a working one for upcoming trips.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great concept but still needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: I travel quite a bit and need internet as a working nomad and while this is a much better product than a device like Skyroam (where you cannot use a local sim). The Glocalme app kept showing a crash error ("android app stopped") but it kept working when you select 'close". But the major issue is that almost everywhere around the world that I have seen to activate a sim you do it via text messaging or calling the local provider. This device does not provide that capability therefore you have to borrow someones phone or find another way to activate the sim which is a huge burden and bothersome so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn K

customer_reviews.title: GlocalMe, hands down the best hotspot on the market.
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot and few years ago, I purchased a GlocalMe G3. I was extremely happy with the device performance, capabilities and options of data packages. The GlocalMe G4 came out and I had to have it. GlocalMe did it again and put out another great product. I’m very impressed with the new features and performance of the G4. If you are a traveler, look no more. No need to pay for costly roaming charges from your carrier. Very fast and reliable connection. If needed, GlocalMe has an awesome and very fast customer support. Thanks GlocalMe!
customer_reviews.author: USMC5USBP10

customer_reviews.title: It's a great gadget.
customer_reviews.text: Does just what it's supposed to, although you may have to explore a little to find all the features. I use it mainly as a personal hotspot with an AT&T card. It's fast and reliable. It also works as a travel hotspot, so you can pay their fee for wifi and use it just about anywhere in the world. My only minor complaint is that if you rename the wifi and turn it off, it loses the name, so you have to rename it net time. There may be a way to save it, but I haven't found it yet. You can just leave the factory name and password, and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jo B. Hayve

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as advertized
customer_reviews.text: Bought this trip for use on a cruise we were on in Asia. Got to Hong Kong and it wouldn't work. Supposed to work there. Not happy with this product. It was supposed to come with 1 Gb free data, but there is no way to get it to work without first hooking up to another wifi. You would think it would be able to connect by itself, but Noooooooo! Non existent customer service as well. I am a verified purchaser and overall unhappy, unsatisfied customer. Do yourself a favor and skip this brand.
customer_reviews.author: MLT

customer_reviews.title: Some Improvements over G3
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1.) New sleek modern look 2.) Lighter Weight (6.50 oz) 3.) Improved battery life 4.) Maps/TripAdvisor/Translate/Exchange Rate Feature Apps Cons: 1.) Some initial lag when loading apps(Maps, TripAdvisor) 2.) Touchscreen isn't as responsive as a smartphone 3.) Does not come with an adapter (only usb cable) All-in-all, it serves it's main purpose as a useful & effective 4G Global data hotspot. If aesthetics are important to you I would recommend this upgrade. If function is important to you then there is no need to upgrade from a G3 Terminal as it seems to be just as effective as it's predecessor in serving up 4G data. These hotspots have been useful when traveling or emergency situations
customer_reviews.author: kaxa

customer_reviews.title: Great option for frequent travelers
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this hotspot for data while on vacation in Italy. It worked flawlessly, with speeds comparable to my home network. For people with at least a few trips planned or a longer trip planne, this will pay for itself very quickly (compare $10/day roaming with 500 MB of data to the relatively low costs of data through GlocalMe (e.g. $22 for 3 GB of data in Italy, good for 30 days as of the time of this review)). The device is intuitive to use and easy to set up. Plans are inexpensive and easy to purchase. This device allowed us to travel off the beaten path and still use GPS for reliable directions.
customer_reviews.author: B. Chow

customer_reviews.title: Best travel wifi!
customer_reviews.text: Glocalme device and service is just amazing!. I’m really enjoying all the simplicity of a decent global internet access, being able to navigate the web, explore maps and even make WhatsApp voice calls with excellent results through Europe and US. I had a G3 device before that was a bit bulky, however still very portable. G4 improved portability a lot with its new form factor without noticeable impact on battery life. The G4 is compact, light and feels like a cell phone. I’m really happy with the device, especially with the CloudSIM technology. If you plan to travel a lot, this is totally a must have!
customer_reviews.author: joso

customer_reviews.title: Returned  to Amazon...
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't figure out how to use this mobile hot-spot gizmo and there was no one to ask. The phone number that was given in the brochure just rang and rang with no answer or voice mail to leave a message. As for the battery life or the signal...who knows?! I couldn't get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Reads

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised.
customer_reviews.text: I was a data sim user before, and comparing it to GlocalMe G4, the Glocal is easier to use and more cost efficient. You do not anymore have to look for a data sim for the country you are visiting. And you can purchase additional data anytime, even have option for unlimited data or volume data, regional or global data. I used this while in the US San Francisco LA and Las Vegas and it works great. Had wifi signal immediately after landing. connected five devices. Would really recommend this product.

High quality and it has lasted as a mainstay mobile wifi hotspot ever since i recieved it

I haven't yet tried it with a local SIM card for data.
